[all packages] [package zeta.session] [class hierarchy] [index]

pure interface of interface zeta.session.Session

The documentated page. 
public interface Session
{
    public abstract void initialize();
    public abstract Unit lookupUnit(Name name)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.UnresolvableName, zeta.session.Failures.AmbigiousName;
    public abstract Unit getUnit(Name unitName)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.NoSuchEntity;
    public abstract Unit getOrCreateUnit(Name unitName);
    public abstract Unit[] getUnits();
    public abstract Locator unitLocator(Unit unit);
    public abstract Adaptor lookupAdaptor(Name name)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.NoSuchEntity;
    public abstract void registerAdaptor(Class adaptorClass)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.EntityExists;
    public abstract Adaptor[] getAdaptors();
    public abstract File getToolDir(Name name);
    public abstract File getLibDir();
    public abstract File getClassDir();
    public abstract void checkExternalData();
    public abstract StorageHandle allocate();
    public abstract void free(StorageHandle handle);
    public abstract void store(StorageHandle handle,
                               Serializable object);
    public abstract Serializable load(StorageHandle handle);
    public abstract void send(Name sender,
                              Message message);
    public abstract void registerListener(Class[] classes,
                                          Listener listener);
    public abstract void unregisterListener(Listener listener);
    public abstract void registerForm(TopLevelForm form);
    public abstract void unregisterForm(TopLevelForm form);
    public abstract void execForm(String prompt,
                                  TopLevelForm form)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
    public abstract TopLevelForm[] getForms();
    public abstract void registerShell(Shell shell);
    public abstract void registerTextEditor(TextEditor editor);
    public abstract TextEditor getTextEditor();
    public abstract void registerContentType(ContentType type);
    public abstract ContentType lookupContentType(Name name)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.NoSuchEntity;
    public abstract ContentType[] getContentTypes();
    public abstract void exit();
    public abstract void abort();
    public abstract void abort(Throwable e);
}
